Help:
Here's the commands you can use:
help - Shows list of commands.
clear - clears the console and re-prints the description of where you are.
inspect - Lists the objects in the room you may interact with.
inspect X - inspect X object.
use X - interact with X object.
inventory - lists the items in your inventory.
use X on Y - use X object on Y object.
take X - add X object to your inventory
turn X on/off - set an item as 'on' or 'off'
Invalid: I don't know what that means! Use 'help' to see a list of valid commands.

Description: You are standing in an empty room, perfect for starting. There is a lamp, and a remote on the floor.
